>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.4wAicxCXZcPLSOVY]{Immortal Tutor (Su)}

You learned to innovate your technomancy to keep pace with the Maelstrom’s everchanging criteria and physics.

Spell:@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} (self only)

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.NznfxDTM6sYbZ2jB]{First Lesson}: When you cast a spell or make an attack that deals acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage, you can choose to replace that damage with one of the five damage types selected at random. If you do so, you can reroll one of the damage dice and use the second result.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.c3Fr6XCwO9E353Il]{Second Lesson}: You reduce the damage you take from a critical hit by twice your technomancer level and gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against the attack’s critical hit effects.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.LLsIYqImeXieZ3lm]{Third Lesson}: Your form becomes extremely fluid. You gain the compression ability (Alien Archive 153), can move through difficult terrain as though it were normal terrain, and gain a +3 circumstance bonus to KAC and saving throws against attacks of opportunity and effects that would grapple or entangle you.

Edit spell in the Details tab.

Spell Preperation should be set to Always Available. And Limited uses set to 1 of 1 /-Day.

Be sure to update the Spell level as you gain access to higher level spells.
